title: Spitfire
writer: Henry C. James (original story), Katherine Strueby (original story), Miles Malleson (screenplay), Anatole de Grunwald (screenplay)
actors: Leslie Howard, David Niven, Rosamund John, Roland Culver
plot: By the late 1920's aircraft designer R.J. Mitchell feels he has achieved all he wants with his revolutionary mono-planes winning trophy after trophy. But a holiday in Germany shortly after Hitler assumes power convinces him that it is vital to design a completely new type of fighter plane and that sooner or later Britain's very survival may depend on what he comes to call the Spitfire.
name: Spitfire
